ToolSearch.title: search
ToolSearch.description: Search the Storyden knowledge base for library pages, forum threads, and other content. Returns relevant results matching the query.

authors.description: Filter by author handles (usernames). Author handles that don't exist will be reported in the error message while still searching with valid authors. Do not use '@' prefix.

categories.description: Filter by category names (for forum threads). Category names are case-insensitive. Categories that don't exist will be reported in the error message while still searching with valid categories.

tags.description: Filter by tag names. Tags are case-sensitive.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 10, max 100)

id.description: Unique identifier

authors.description: Filter by author handles (usernames). Author handles that don't exist will be reported in the error message while still searching with valid authors. Do not use '@' prefix.

categories.description: Filter by category names (for forum threads). Category names are case-insensitive. Categories that don't exist will be reported in the error message while still searching with valid categories.

tags.description: Filter by tag names. Tags are case-sensitive.

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (default 10, max 100)

id.description: Unique identifier
Unique identifier

ToolRobotSwitch.title: robot_switch
ToolRobotSwitch.description: Switch the current conversation to a different Robot (agent). Use this when the user wants to talk to a different specialized agent or when a different agent would be better suited to help with the user's request.

robot_id.description: The ID of the Robot (agent) to switch to. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string). Use robot_list to see available Robot IDs.

success.description: Whether the agent switch was successful

robot_id.description: The ID of the robot that was switched to
The ID of the Robot (agent) to switch to. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string). Use robot_list to see available Robot IDs.

success.description: Whether the agent switch was successful

robot_id.description: The ID of the robot that was switched to

ToolRobotGetAllToolNames.title: system_all_tool_names
ToolRobotGetAllToolNames.description: Get a list of all available tool names and their descriptions. This is useful when creating or updating a Robot to know what tools are available without loading full schemas. Returns a lightweight list of tool names and brief descriptions.

output.description: List of all available tools with their names and descriptions

description.description: Brief description of what the tool does

ToolRobotGetAllToolNamesOutput.description: List of all available tools with their names and descriptions

description.description: Brief description of what the tool does
Brief description of what the tool does

ToolRobotCreate.title: robot_create
ToolRobotCreate.description: Create a new Robot (agent) with a specific purpose and behavior. Robots are customizable automations that can help users with specific workflows using tailored tools and instructions.

name.description: The name of the Robot - should be descriptive and help identify its purpose

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the Robot's purpose and capabilities

playbook.description: The directive/system prompt that defines how the Robot behaves, what it helps with, and its personality. This is the primary instruction that guides the Robot's behavior.

tools.description: List of tool names that the Robot can use.

id.description: The unique identifier of the created Robot

name.description: The name of the Robot - should be descriptive and help identify its purpose

description.description: Optional human-readable description of the Robot's purpose and capabilities

playbook.description: The directive/system prompt that defines how the Robot behaves, what it helps with, and its personality. This is the primary instruction that guides the Robot's behavior.

tools.description: List of tool names that the Robot can use.

id.description: The unique identifier of the created Robot

ToolRobotList.title: robot_list
ToolRobotList.description: List all available Robots. Use this to see what Robots have been created and what they do.

limit.description: Maximum number of Robots to return (default 20)

id.description: Unique identifier

description.description: Human-readable description of the Robot's purpose

limit.description: Maximum number of Robots to return (default 20)

id.description: Unique identifier

description.description: Human-readable description of the Robot's purpose

id.description: Unique identifier

description.description: Human-readable description of the Robot's purpose

ToolRobotGet.title: robot_get
ToolRobotGet.description: Get details of a specific Robot by its ID. Use this to view the full configuration of a Robot.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Robot to retrieve. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string). Example: cq3pqt0q91s73dq8r000
The unique identifier of the Robot

description.description: Human-readable description of the Robot's purpose

tools.description: List of tool names that the Robot can use

id.description: The unique identifier of the Robot to retrieve. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string). Example: cq3pqt0q91s73dq8r000
The unique identifier of the Robot

description.description: Human-readable description of the Robot's purpose

tools.description: List of tool names that the Robot can use

ToolRobotUpdate.title: robot_update
ToolRobotUpdate.description: Update a Robot's configuration. You can modify its name, description, playbook (directive), or tools. Only provide the fields you want to change.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Robot to update. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string).

name.description: The new name for the Robot

description.description: The new description for the Robot

playbook.description: The new directive/system prompt for the Robot

tools.description: The new list of tool names that the Robot can use.

id.description: The unique identifier of the updated Robot
The unique identifier of the Robot to update. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string).

name.description: The new name for the Robot

description.description: The new description for the Robot

playbook.description: The new directive/system prompt for the Robot

tools.description: The new list of tool names that the Robot can use.

id.description: The unique identifier of the updated Robot
The unique identifier of the Robot to delete. Must be a valid XID format (20 character alphanumeric string).

ToolLibraryPageTree.title: library_page_list
ToolLibraryPageTree.description: Get the full tree structure of pages in the library. Returns a hierarchical view of all wiki pages showing their parent-child relationships.

depth.description: Maximum depth to traverse (-1 for unlimited, 0 for root only, 1 for root + children, etc.)

pages.description: List of pages in tree structure

parent.description: Slug of the parent page (omitted for root pages)

depth.description: Maximum depth to traverse (-1 for unlimited, 0 for root only, 1 for root + children, etc.)

pages.description: List of pages in tree structure

parent.description: Slug of the parent page (omitted for root pages)
Slug of the parent page (omitted for root pages)

ToolLibraryPageGet.title: get_library_page
ToolLibraryPageGet.description: Get detailed information about a specific library page by its slug.

id.description: The unique identifier of the library page to retrieve
The unique identifier of the library page to retrieve

ToolLibraryPageCreate.title: create_library_page
ToolLibraryPageCreate.description: Create a new page in the library. A slug will be generated automatically if not provided.

slug.description: The unique slug for this page. If not provided, one will be generated from the name.

content.description: The content of the page in HTML format

parent.description: Slug of the parent page. Only include if you already have a parent slug available. Leave empty to create a root-level page.

url.description: Optional external URL if this page references a topic on another website

slug.description: The slug of the created page

name.description: The name of the created page

content.description: The content of the page in HTML format

parent.description: Slug of the parent page. Only include if you already have a parent slug available. Leave empty to create a root-level page.

url.description: Optional external URL if this page references a topic on another website

slug.description: The slug of the created page

name.description: The name of the created page

ToolLibraryPageUpdate.title: update_library_page
ToolLibraryPageUpdate.description: Update an existing page in the library. Only provide the fields you want to change.

id.description: The unique identifier of the page to update

name.description: The new name/title of the page

content.description: The new content of the page in HTML format

parent.description: New parent page slug. Provide to move the page to a different parent.

slug.description: The slug of the updated page

name.description: The name of the updated page

id.description: The unique identifier of the page to update

content.description: The new content of the page in HTML format

parent.description: New parent page slug. Provide to move the page to a different parent.

slug.description: The slug of the updated page

name.description: The name of the updated page

ToolLibraryPageSearch.title: search_library_pages
ToolLibraryPageSearch.description: Search for pages in the library wiki. Returns matching pages based on the search query.

ToolTagList.title: tag_list
ToolTagList.description: Get a list of all tags on the site or search for tags by name. Tags are labels used to categorize and organize content. Each tag includes its name and the number of items tagged with it.

query.description: Optional search query to filter tags by name. If not provided, returns all tags.

item_count.description: Number of items tagged with this tag

query.description: Optional search query to filter tags by name. If not provided, returns all tags.

item_count.description: Number of items tagged with this tag
Number of items tagged with this tag

ToolLinkCreate.title: link_create
ToolLinkCreate.description: Create or update a link in the shared bookmarks list. Fetches the URL and extracts OpenGraph metadata (title, description) and plain text content. Useful for bookmarking websites, articles, or any web content.

url.description: The URL to create a bookmark for. Must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL.

plain_text.description: Plain text content extracted from the page

url.description: The URL to create a bookmark for. Must be a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL.

plain_text.description: Plain text content extracted from the page

ToolThreadCreate.title: thread_create
ToolThreadCreate.description: Create a new discussion thread in the forum. Threads are discussions organized by category with tags for better discovery.

body.description: The content of the thread in HTML format

category.description: The category slug for the thread. Use category_list to see available categories.

url.description: Optional URL if this thread is about a specific link

body.description: The content of the thread in HTML format

category.description: The category slug for the thread. Use category_list to see available categories.

url.description: Optional URL if this thread is about a specific link

ToolThreadList.title: thread_list
ToolThreadList.description: List and search discussion threads with filtering and pagination.

ToolThreadGet.title: thread_get
ToolThreadGet.description: Get a specific thread with its content. Returns the thread details including author, content, and category information.

id.description: The unique identifier of the thread to retrieve
The unique identifier of the thread to retrieve
The unique identifier of the thread to update

body.description: New content for the thread in HTML format

id.description: The unique identifier of the thread to update

body.description: New content for the thread in HTML format

ToolThreadReply.title: thread_reply
ToolThreadReply.description: Add a reply to an existing thread

id.description: The unique identifier of the thread to reply to

body.description: The reply content in HTML format

id.description: The unique identifier of the thread to reply to

body.description: The reply content in HTML format

ToolCategoryList.title: category_list
ToolCategoryList.description: List all thread categories with their names and descriptions

id.description: Unique identifier of the datagraph item

slug.description: URL-friendly slug of the datagraph item

kind.description: Type of datagraph item (thread, node, profile, collection, etc.)

datagraph_item.description: Optional reference to a datagraph item if the user is viewing one (e.g., a thread, library page, profile)

id.description: Unique identifier of the datagraph item

slug.description: URL-friendly slug of the datagraph item

kind.description: Type of datagraph item (thread, node, profile, collection, etc.)

page_type.description: Human-readable page type if not viewing a specific datagraph item. Examples: 'Index page', 'Settings page', 'Admin page', 'Search page'. This is free-form text since the backend doesn't know about frontend routes.
